abstract: One proposed remedy from the F.T.C. in its lawsuit against Intel would finally hand Nvidia the rights to produce mainstream computing chips.
snippet: One proposed remedy from the F.T.C. in its lawsuit against Intel would finally hand Nvidia the rights to produce mainstream computing chips.
lead_paragraph: As part of its lawsuit against Intel filed on Wednesday, the Federal Trade Commission proposed a wish list of things it would like to see happen if it can prove its case. And one of these items is a real doozy.

headline.main: Has the F.T.C. Opened the Door for the Great Chip War?
